${ModID}:Bind.NAME: Bind
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Attack deals #b%d less damage.
This enemy's next attack deals #b%d less damage.

${ModID}:CopyAndPastePower.NAME: Copy and Paste
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a copy of it that costs #b0 into your discard pile.
Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a #b%d copies of it that cost #b0 into your discard pile.
Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a copy of it that costs #b0 into your draw pile.
Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a #b%d copies of it that cost #b0 into your draw pile.

${ModID}:CrossStitchPower.NAME: Cross Stitch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn, apply #b%1$d #yBind to %2$s.

${ModID}:PincushionPower.NAME: Pincushion
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ReadingPower.NAME: Reading
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yStitch a %s to a random card in your hand.
